overview: Meet Jack English, a 93-year-old legend who lives in a cabin isolated deep in the Ventana Wilderness.  While on a hunting trip he learned that an old homestead in the Ventana Wilderness was being put up for auction by the estate of a childless heiress. He put a bid on the property and won. On the land he built a small cabin using materials from the land and milling trees by hand. When his wife passed away, Jack effectively left "society" and moved to the cabin full time.
tagline: 93-year-old Jack English lives alone in a cabin deep in the Ventana wilderness.
title: Jack
